html.body:
Last modification: May 25, 2024


Thank you for using “Shutter Notes”.

By using “Shutter Notes” the user agrees with the following terms:

1. Mobile applications, like any other piece of software are prone to failures, bugs, crashes, data losses and other malfunctions. The operating system and the hardware on which it is running are prone to the same problems. So, Haraldo Albergaria is not responsible for any consequences of such malfunctions, use this application at your own risk.

2. The maps service is provided by “Google MapsTM” API, so Haraldo Albergaria is not responsible for any malfunctions that can occur with it and any consequences of it.

3. These terms are subjected to changes. In this case, the user will be notified in the application page on “Google Play StoreTM” when a new version of the app has been released and by continuing using the application the user automatically agrees with the new terms.



“Google MapsTM” and “Google Play StoreTM” are trademarks of Google, Inc. “FlickrTM” is a trademark of SmugMug, Inc.

Haraldo Albergaria does not have any partnership or any other form of relation with Google, Inc. or SmugMug, Inc.

Last modification: May 25, 2024


Thank you for using Shutter Notes

Through this document, Haraldo Albergaria guarantee that Shutter Notes does not collect any user's personal data necessary to the proper operation of the application, including current location. These data are stored only on local storage of the user's device and it is not sent in any way to Haraldo Albergaria. If the user uninstall the app, all this data is permanently deleted. Shutter Notes also does not collect any other user's personal data, including phone identity, contacts, files, installed applications or any other data that can identify the user. The internet connection is used only by the purpose of get the maps, the locations and connect to user's FlickrTM account to which will be sent, with explicit user permission, the data inserted in the application, and only in case the function Flickr Note is used.

This document is subjected to changes. In this case, the user will be notified in the application page on Google Play StoreTM when a new version of the app have been released.



Google Play StoreTM is a trademark of Google, Inc. "FlickrTM" is a trademark of SmugMug, Inc.

The camera shutter representation in the application icon and the icons inside the application were designed by Google, Inc. under the “material design guidelines“ and used and modified according to Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License (CC-BY 4.0).\n\nThe stock pictures used on main screen buttons were provided by KaboomPics and are free to use.
